title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
• 1 point is earned for the correct answer.

    Let x represent the natural abundance of Ne-20.

    19.99 x + 21.99(1–x) = 20.18

    19.99 x + 21.99 – 21.99 x = 20.18

    19.99 x – 21.99 x = 20.18 – 21.99

    –2 x = –1.81

    x = 0.905

    ⇒ percent abundances are: Ne-20 = 90.5%

    Ne-22 = 9.5%

  • 1 point is earned for the correct molar mass.

    1 point is earned for the correct fraction of Ne-22 in Ne.

    12.55  g Ne × 1  mol Ne 20.18  g Ne × 0.095  mol Ne-22 1  mol Ne × 6.022 × 10 23  Ne-22 atoms 1  mol Ne-22 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaGymaiaaik dacaGGUaGaaGynaiaaiwdacaqGGaGaae4zaiaabccacaqGobGaaeyz aiabgEna0oaalaaabaGaaGymaiaabccacaqGTbGaae4BaiaabYgaca qGGaGaaeOtaiaabwgaaeaacaaIYaGaaGimaiaac6cacaaIXaGaaGio aiaabccacaqGNbGaaeiiaiaab6eacaqGLbaaaiabgEna0oaalaaaba GaaGimaiaac6cacaaIWaGaaGyoaiaaiwdacaqGGaGaaeyBaiaab+ga caqGSbGaaeiiaiaab6eacaqGLbGaaeylaiaabkdacaqGYaaabaGaaG ymaiaabccacaqGTbGaae4BaiaabYgacaqGGaGaaeOtaiaabwgaaaGa ey41aq7aaSaaaeaacaaI2aGaaiOlaiaaicdacaaIYaGaaGOmaiabgE na0kaaigdacaaIWaWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaGaaG4maaaakiaabcca caqGobGaaeyzaiaab2cacaqGYaGaaeOmaiaabccacaqGHbGaaeiDai aab+gacaqGTbGaae4CaaqaaiaaigdacaqGGaGaaeyBaiaab+gacaqG SbGaaeiiaiaab6eacaqGLbGaaeylaiaabkdacaqGYaaaaaaa@7F82@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
• 1 point is earned for the correct answer.

    E = hv

    = 6.63 x 10-34 J s x 1.00 x 1015 s–1
